@ gassa. Yes I know how to shrink DVDs. But my hard disk drive is constantly full and to dl DVD9 and then shrink it will take more space than I have. It will take a lot longer time to dl it. Peers don't seed big torrents as long as small ones. It will take for ever to reach my usual ratio of 5:1. And the best reason is: This is a low budget sci-fi with plastic ears and crappy special effects - not Spider-Man 3.
